# Fetch Blocks Overview

This section covers APIs related to fetch blocks on Push Chain.

<head>
  <title>{`Fetch Blocks | Push Chain | Push Documentation`}</title>
</head>

## Fetch Blocks by Hash

import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import Details from '@theme/Details';
import {
  ModalContainer,
  ModalSmall,
  ModalWrapper,
  AFocus,
} from '@site/src/css/SharedStyling';

Returns a block by its hash.

<Tabs className="codetabs" groupId="code-examples">
  <TabItem value="js" attributes={{className: "codetab js"}} default>
    Let's search for a block with hash `ad5184d509d4e37ecbd928c958ea793f9d11ff0e0c1cbee53b3a3c6a9398e730`

    ```typescript
    const block = await pushNetwork.block.search('ad5184d509d4e37ecbd928c958ea793f9d11ff0e0c1cbee53b3a3c6a9398e730')
    ```

  </TabItem>
</Tabs>

### `pushNetwork.tx.search` info parameters

| Param    | Type     | Remarks          |
| -------- | -------- | ---------------- |
| `txHash` | `string` | Transaction Hash |

<Details summary="Expected response">
